summary: On an asteroid in outer space, a brave boy named Leo hopes to one day follow in the footsteps of his family's legacy: to fix The Star Maker when the stars begin to fall from the sky.
cast: Marcelo Armand|Bobby Becht|Daniel J. Edwards|Pablo Gandolfo|Valeria Gomez|Amanda Goodman|Lucila Gómez|Angela Mulligan|Alejandro Outeyral|Victoria Ramos|Tony Salerno|Bill Timoney
title: La máquina que hace estrellas
